product_name: Joby Action Clamp and Locking Arm
long_description: The Joby Action Clamp and Locking Arm quickly secures your action cam almost anywhere with fast, flexible positioning to catch that perfect shot and capture your outdoor fun. 2 articulating ball joints let you position your camera at any angle; lock the arm in place with the tightening knob for strong, vibration-resistant stability. Sliding locking arm moves quickly to accommodate a surface as thin as a stop sign or as thick as a 2 in. table; screwing arm locks the sliding arm in place. Ingenious sliding design lets you quickly close the gap on surfaces and locks automatically as you tighten the screwing arm. Easily screw in the arm on either end of the Action Clamp. Comes with a tripod mount for GoPro; remove the GoPro mount to attach a Contour, Sony or any other camera with 1/4 - 20 in. mounting threads. When you combine the Joby Action Clamp and Locking Arm with the Joby GripTight Mount (sold separately), you'll be able to set up your iPhone or Android phone.
